snippet: One lawsuit is filed and another is considered against Michael T. Slager and the city of North Charleston, S.C.
abstract: Lawsuit is filed against Police Officer Michael T Slager and city of North Charleston, NC, by Julius G Wilson, who was stunned by Slager with Taser in August 2014; suit comes in wake of Slager's fatal shooting of unarmed black man Walter L Scott, and city is expected to soon face other lawsuits involving Slager's actions as a North Charleston police officer.
lead_paragraph: One lawsuit is filed and another is considered against Michael T. Slager and the city of North Charleston, S.C.

headline.main: Walter Scott Shooting Seen as Opening for Civil Suits Against North Charleston’s Police Dept.
headline.print_headline: High-Profile Shooting Seen Opening Way for Civil Suits Against City’s Police Dept.
